/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the clear blue sky. Cars of various colors are parked along the side of the road, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The lush green trees lining the street provide a refreshing contrast to the concrete structures. The sun shines brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene and enhancing the overall clarity of the image.
